Help Screen: G0004

Coverage Rules

• Coverage: Coverage Name

This parameter is configured using item(s) BasicCoverageStructure in param P0050.

• Basic Or Rider Indicator: If Basic or Rider

This parameter is configured using item(s) BasicOrRider in param P0050.

• Mandatory Indicator: Madotory Indicator

This parameter is configured using item(s) MandInd in param P0050.

• No Of Times: No Of Times
